title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: After crossing Glencorse Burn, the road passes (7) House- of-Muir, where a large sheep market is held in spring.

title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: At the head of this valley the Logan Water, which, further down, is called the Glencorse Burn, falls over a lofty precipice in the midst of a barren uninhabited glen.
